title: [Large-scale] Game-Based Learning Course for Understanding Salt Chemistry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts (ions, atoms, compounds)
context.additional_context: Creating game-based learning environments using VR simulations and smartphones, with project-based assessments measuring comprehensive understanding

learning_goals: Learners can explain the chemical composition of salt (ionic bonding, crystal structure).
Learners can present three or more examples of salt applications in daily life and industrial contexts.
Through in-game problem-solving activities, learners can classify types of salts (e.g., sodium chloride, potassium nitrate) with 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
